mapper.select: SELECT WQ.ID, WQ.STARTED_AT, WQ.FINISHED_AT, WW.CHARACTER_LENGTH FROM WORDLE_QUIZZES WQ, WORDLE_WORDS WW WHERE WQ.WORD_ID = WW.ID AND WQ.STARTED_AT <= SYSTIMESTAMP AND SYSTIMESTAMP <= WQ.FINISHED_AT

SELECT WQ.ID, WQ.STARTED_AT, WQ.FINISHED_AT, WQ.CREATED_AT, WQ.UPDATED_AT, WW.ID AS WORD_ID, WW.CHARACTERS, WW.CHARACTER_LENGTH FROM WORDLE_QUIZZES WQ, WORDLE_WORDS WW WHERE WQ.WORD_ID = WW.ID AND WQ.DELETED_AT IS NULL AND WQ.ID = #{wordleQuizId}

SELECT WQ.ID, WQ.STARTED_AT, WQ.FINISHED_AT, WQ.CREATED_AT, WQ.UPDATED_AT, WW.ID AS WORD_ID, WW.CHARACTERS, WW.CHARACTER_LENGTH FROM WORDLE_QUIZZES WQ, WORDLE_WORDS WW WHERE WQ.WORD_ID = WW.ID AND WQ.DELETED_AT IS NULL AND WQ.ID = #{wordleQuizId} AND WQ.STARTED_AT <= SYSTIMESTAMP AND SYSTIMESTAMP <= WQ.FINISHED_AT
